name: FAME Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Florals.Scent Type:Warm Florals.Key Notes:Mango, Jasmine, and Incense.Fragrance Description:Capturing the irresistible star in every woman, FAME Parfum is an intense woody chypre blend of sensual jasmine, hypnotic incense, and addictive musk. Crafted with the utmost refinement, the fragrance is responsibly formulated with the most precious, ethically sourced ingredients..About the Bottle:Inspired by Rabanneu2019s legendary couture codes and unforgettable chainmail dress, FAME Parfum gets dressed in a seductive new object of desire. As precious as jewelry; as iconic as ever: the signature golden tone of FAME gets styled with a glossy black dress to match the intensity of the champagne gold fragrance inside..About the Fragrance:Powered by multifaceted femininity, FAME Parfum by Rabanne reveals her most enticing facet. Capturing the spirit of Paris at night, sensual jasmine meets hypnotic incense and irresistible musk in an intense fragrance blend thatu2019s just as famous as her. Feel magnetic. Be the star. Be FAME Parfum.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water), Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool, Hydroxycitronellal, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Limonene, Benzyl Benzoate, Citronellol, Coumarin, Geraniol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Cinnamyl Alcohol, Alcohol, Tris(Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate, Farnesol, Citral, Benzyl Alcohol, Ci 19140 (Yellow 5), Ci 14700 (Red 4), Ci 42090 (Blue 1).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent... Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

reviews.review_text: Love the scent! Not a strong overbearing scent but it lasts for hours! Plus the bottle is pretty cool!  This is my new go to perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is way too beautiful and luxurious to use! I adore every time when I use it the vibe is so luxurious and it smells good and long lasting! If you want to surprise someone you love to could definitely choose this fragrance as a gift!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like it. Depending on what you like this may just be the right scent for you. It wasnu2019t to strong but would definitely last throughout the day. I definitely enjoyed the product and would buy it again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells ok. Not worth the $ though. Doesn't really stand out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smell great, but does not last long in the skin at all. Smell was gone after about 30 minutes. The smell does last on clothes though but does not project well. I can smell it on myself but others cannot. Pretty disappointing being that this is the version thatu2019s supposed to be stronger than the silver bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this perfume for free in exchange for my honest review and I must say that I was very pleasantly surprised by this perfume, I expected a strong scent but was met with a woody, fruity, musky scent that would be amazing as a signature daily scent. I would definitely recommend this perfume and I also really like the bottle and the way it sprays.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Paco Rabanne Fame is a solid fragrance with good staying power, lasting through the night. The warm, floral scent and is pleasant without being overwhelming. Its packaging stands out with a unique and creative design. Overall, it's a great addition to my collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free gift from Influenster. This perfume smells really great! It is very fruity floral and projects very nice, it lasts a decently long time. The packaging is super cute it is a great bottle to have on display. I am not typically a floral girl, I prefer gourmands, but this is still a very nice perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smell was a little strong for my liking. The packing was beautiful though. Iu2019m sure that some people would like the smell, just not my cup of tea. Spray was good, generous size. Definitely didnu2019t need much to get the effect. I received my perfume through Influenster for free.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great perfume, mature and intense scent also lasted all day long for me, I would definitely recommend and buy this product, became my go to perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay firstly the bottle is so cute and different! It stands out in my perfume shelf. The fragrance is nice and floral but I felt it was little too strong for me. It has a floral scent with notes of Jasmine and Musk. I wear this more often in the evening time as I feel it suits me better than the day. However it lasts super long and I can still smell it on my clothes the next day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is adorable and shelf worthy. The scent strength is amazing with only one spray sometimes I can still smell it after 12h of wear.  The projection of the spray is very precise so there is no waste. This is a perfume you can wear anywhere and since you can go far with only one spray is a great choice. Will definitely buy again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is SUCH a sexy scent. It is versatile as itu2019s unisex so any one can wear it! Because itu2019s not an overly feminine or masculine, you can pair it with another scent to really customize your aura. Itu2019s gorgeous. And the bottle is SO CUTE! I showed it to my friends and they loved it. Perfect for every day or when you wanna feel FINE.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells heavenly.  I have wore it multiple times after receiving and it stays for almost whole day. Not very strong but pleasant smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved loved loved this perfume! I canu2019t say enough about how much this perfume just stood out to me with its warm scent and the packaging is stunning. This scent is so nice that even my husband started wearing it so definitely a gender neutral scent that everyone can enjoy. Will purchase again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. The packaging is simple and clean. This scent is made for the warm floral girlies! A strong opening note of mango that quickly dries down to a jasmine incense musk. It is warm and inviting and perfect for a night out. It would be safe to use as an every day fragrance as it has a good balance between floral and musk. The longevity is decent and lingers on the skin for several hours. I received many compliments from friends when wearing this. If you enjoy Kilianu2019s Love, Donu2019t Be Shy or Canu2019t Stop Loving You then youu2019re likely to enjoy this perfume. The price point is reasonable in my opinion and worth the investment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a sexy fragrance! Right off the bat, you get this subtle hit of  juicy mango that is sweet and fruity in the best way. Then, it warms up with a sprinkle of benzoin, adding a nice warmth. If youu2019re not a fan of super strong incense (same here!), fear not! This scent blends it in just right, giving you a hint of spicy goodness without being overpowering. Itu2019s like the perfect secret ingredient that makes you go, u201cOoh, whatu2019s that?!u201d I also usually find jasmine a bit too much, but they nail it with just the right amount. It adds a lovely floral touch without being in-your-face.  I find this scent strong, and 2-3 spritzu2019s will do the job to have you smelling deliciously sexy throughout the whole day. Fame could actually be worn day or night, which I love. Itu2019s overall SO pretty and a beautiful addition to my fragrance collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume initially caught my eye because of the beautiful packaging. It has such a luxurious look and is a great addition to the perfume shelf. It has a deeper warm smell, which for me is perfect for a night out. It isnu2019t my typical type of scent, but I was pleasantly surprised! Then, it warms up with a sprinkle of benzoin, adding a nice warmth. If youu2019re not a fan of super strong incense (same here!), fear not! This scent blends it in just right, giving you a hint of spicy goodness without being overpowering. Itu2019s like the perfect secret ingredient that makes you go, u201cOoh, whatu2019s that?!u201d I also usually find jasmine a bit too much, but they nail it with just the right amount. It adds a lovely floral touch without being in-your-face.  I find this scent strong, and 2-3 spritzu2019s will do the job to have you smelling deliciously sexy throughout the whole day. Fame could actually be worn day or night, which I love. Itu2019s overall SO pretty and a beautiful addition to my fragrance collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume initially caught my eye because of the beautiful packaging. It has such a luxurious look and is a great addition to the perfume shelf. I showed it to my friends and they loved it. Perfect for every day or when you wanna feel FINE.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. The packaging is simple and clean. This scent is made for the warm floral girlies! A strong opening note of mango that quickly dries down to a jasmine incense musk. It is warm and inviting and perfect for a night out. It would be safe to use as an every day fragrance as it has a good balance between floral and musk. The longevity is decent and lingers on the skin for several hours. I received many compliments from friends when wearing this. If you enjoy Kilianu2019s Love, Donu2019t Be Shy or Canu2019t Stop Loving You then youu2019re likely to enjoy this perfume. The price point is reasonable in my opinion and worth the investment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free in exchange for my review, and this is the second perfume I  have received to review. I did not have high hopes, as the first perfume I received from influencer was extremely strong and had a very harsh scent. I was pleasantly surprised to find that this perfume was so pleasant! I find it to be quite light and airy, not too heavy or dense. It has longevity and lasts throughout the day, I like to apply it to my neck and my wrists, and I am able to smell it throughout the whole day. It is a very soft, delicate scent - mostly Jasmine with a hint of musk,  and not the least bit overbearing as one might assume from a scent called Fame.  As the day goes on, I noticed that it almost has a vanilla note to it.   It is very understated in the best way, and it makes me smile when I smell it - both from the familiarity of and the loveliness of the scent.   I really enjoy this scent and will definitely keep it in my perfume rotation.  **I received a free sample of this product in exchange for an honest review.**

reviews.review_text: Paco Rabanne Fame Parfum is a masterpiece in a bottle. From the moment you spritz it on, you're transported into a realm of sophistication and allure. The fragrance opens with a burst of floral and fruity notes, tantalizing the senses with hints of jasmine and bergamot, perfectly balanced with a touch of blackcurrant. As it settles, the heart notes reveal themselves, exuding warmth and depth with a blend of orange blossom and vanilla. Finally, the base notes linger, leaving a trail of sensual musk and patchouli that captivates and entices.  What sets Paco Rabanne Fame Parfum apart is its longevity and sillage. A few spritzes in the morning last well into the evening, enveloping you in a subtle yet alluring aura that draws compliments wherever you go. Whether worn during the day or for a special evening out, this fragrance adapts effortlessly to any occasion, leaving a lasting impression without overwhelming the senses.  Packaged in a sleek and elegant bottle, Paco Rabanne Fame Parfum not only delights the olfactory senses but also adds a touch of glamour to your vanity. Its versatility, longevity, and captivating scent make it a must-have addition to any fragrance collection. In summary, Paco Rabanne Fame Parfum is more than just a scentu2014it's an experience that elevates your senses and leaves you feeling confident, elegant, and utterly irresistible.

reviews.review_title: Get noticed with this elegant and bold scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: *I received this product through influenster for my honest review*   I recently tried the Paco Rabanne Fame Parfum and I have to say, I am absolutely in love with it. The scent is unique and captivating, and it lasts all day without being overwhelming.  The first thing that caught my attention was the packaging. The bottle is sleek and elegant, with a touch of edginess with its black and gold design. It definitely stands out on my vanity and adds a touch of luxury to my collection.  The scent itself is a perfect blend of sweet and spicy notes. The top notes of mandarin and pink pepper give it a refreshing and fruity kick, while the heart notes of vanilla and coffee add a warm and sensual touch. The base notes of patchouli and cedarwood give it a woody and earthy undertone, making it a well-rounded and complex fragrance.  What I love most about this perfume is its longevity. I only need a few sprays in the morning and it lasts throughout the day. I have received numerous compliments while wearing it, with people asking what scent I am wearing.  The only downside to this perfume is that it may be too strong for some people. It is a powerful and bold scent, so I would recommend spraying it lightly to avoid it from being overwhelming.  Overall, I highly recommend the Paco Rabanne Fame Parfum for anyone looking for a unique and long-lasting scent. It is perfect for both day and night wear, and it will definitely make you stand out in a crowd. I will definitely be purchasing this fragrance in the future.

I would recommend this perfume to anyone who loves a perfume that lasts all day and smells like the high quality that it is.

reviews.review_title: One of my new favourite perfumes

reviews.review_title: Very long lasting, strong floral perfume
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I sprayed this just once and it lasted 8 hours on me, if not more. This is very concentrated, which is great it means it's long lasting! In my opinion, the jasmine note overpowers the mango and incense but this would make a great summer perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Let me spill the tea on Paco Rabanne's latest vibe u2013 Fame. So, imagine this: you spray it, and BOOM! Mango and Bergamot kick off the party. It's like a tropical blast that screams, Let's get this fiesta started! Seriously, it's the kinda entrance you want at every shindig.  Jasmine and Olibanum. Now, I ain't a flower expert, but these two are like the Beyoncu00e9 and Jay-Z of the perfume world. Jasmine brings the floral drama, while Olibanum adds this creamy, smoky thing that's lowkey addictive. Can't lie, I'm here for it. As the night goes on, Fame wraps you in Sandalwood and Vanilla. It's like a warm, sweet hug that lingers. You know when you walk past and someone's like, Dang, who smells amazing? Yeah, that's the Fame effect.  And the bottle? So Pretty! Itu2019s not just a bottle; it's a statement piece.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really enjoyed trying this fragrance out. It starts off clean and fruity and settles in with warm vanilla notes. It's a sweet but not overpowering scent perfect for everyday and it's long lasting and hold its scent for hours. The bottle absolutely stunning! Very chic. Would recommend to anyone looking for a long lasting perfume.  I received this in exchange for my review via Influenster

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: WOW! This perfume blew away my expectations! Such a lovely scent and super unique! Itu2019s also very versatile I find Iu2019m wearing it everyday but also reaching for it for special occasions! Also the packaging is adorable!

reviews.review_title: A must have in my routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a woody, fruity floral fragrance with noticeable notes of jasmine, mango, musk, and patchouli. The manjo notes disappear after a couple minutes and then jasmine and patchouli become more prominent. It has a moderate sillage with the first 2-3 hours of wear and then sits close to the skin. The fragrance lasts around 5-6 hours with lower projection as it fades.This fragrance would be a great wear for all year round, especially in the cooler weather. It is a more sophisticated woody floral fragrance than the original FAME that has more tropical vanilla florals. The bottle is a work of art with a glass body and plastic cap. The details on the bottle are very unique and well made.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have a LOT of perfume, but ever since I got this one, I have been reaching for it again and again. I don't love scents that are floral, so the fact that this leans into the deeper scents is perfect for me. Also, the bottle is so cool.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a bottle if this fit free to review for influenster and I love it!!! Itu2019s such a classy scent and I got many compliments on it while out at social gatherings over the last little bit! The bottle is also so adorable and it looks great on my vanity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect warm fruity floral for the warmer months. At first, I was a bit thrown off by how tropical the top notes were but found the base vanilla and sandalwood notes much better. Lovely packaging and definitely long lasting, an overall feminine and flirty scent.

reviews.review_title: Absolutely adorable bottle and smells fabulous
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I canu2019t say I have ever seen such a unique bottle design.  This perfume steals the show on my perfume tray- an adorable robot lady complete with sunglasses, a dress and boots.  I am in love with the scent.  It is feminine and sweet while also carrying some notes of musk.  It also almost smells slightly tropical to me which I think is likely the notes of mango. As someone who is not a fan of floraly scents this is perfect for me.  I feel this perfume wears well for both day and night.  My husband loves when I put this one on.  I feel the scent stays on well throughout the day while not smelling overpowering.  I would definitely recommend this perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Paco Rabanne's Fame parfum is my absolute favorite! Its enchanting scent is incredibly pleasant, radiating a sweet aroma that lingers delicately throughout the day. Wearing this perfume makes me feel undeniably feminine, and its captivating notes have seamlessly become my everyday signature scent. The fragrance is both subtle and striking, adding a touch of allure to every moment. Paco Rabanne has truly crafted a masterpiece with Fame u2013 a scent that effortlessly elevates my daily experiences, making each day a fragrant journey of confidence and femininity. Highly recommended for those who appreciate a delightful and enduring fragrance.

reviews.review_title: FAME: Luxe, playful, empowering, jasmine magic
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Paco Rabanne FAME, a delightful blend of jasmine, mango, and creamy incense, landed in my collection for free in exchange for a review. This fragrance exudes a playful yet sensual vibe, empowering the spirit. The notes linger beautifully, offering a touch of modern femininity. The fact that I received it for free doesn't compromise its luxurious appeal. It's a gem worth exploring for those seeking a unique and captivating scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

I think itu2019s more of a summery scent but itu2019s not too u2018loudu2019 so it can be totally worn all year round. The opening itu2019s creamy mango and bergamot in the dry down I can smell vanilla and kind of coconut even though itu2019s not listed in the notes. Itu2019s a lovely summery feel good scent. It lasts 6+ hours on my skin. The silage itu2019s moderate which is good. I really like this smell and will repurchase after finishing this bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

A fragrance that will truly make you feel glamorous!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This new Paco Rabanne Fame perfume smells nice. The bottle is so cute! I can recognize the notes of mango and jasmine. I got plenty of compliments and happy to have discovered this amazing fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin

The only thing that is a downside personally to me is for the price of this fragrance the bottle does feel a bit cheap. I have other perfumes that definitely have a heavier/luxurious feel to them. Other than that itu2019s a beautiful perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I found this scent to be bold but very nice! It was quite long lasting as well. Overall, really pleasant perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely exceeded my expectations because I did not expect to love this as much as I did. Itu2019s one of those classy elegant scents thatu2019s great for special occasions but itu2019s also one that you can easily over do so be generous with the sprays. The bottle is stunning and would make a lovely gift for someone although the scent isnu2019t the most long lasting throughout the night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: *Incentivized* I love how not over powering this fragrance is. It smells natural and not too strong that it makes me nauseous.  The top notes I picked up was bergamot, jasmine, and some fruitiness from the mango.  Although the scent didnu2019t last the whole day, which I didnu2019t mind. A good six hours in, it was still pretty good but did mellow out in the lasting hours to a more lighter vanilla and floral scent which was very nice. The fragrance provides a femininity that I like, which also the brand advertises. It also gives off sensual vibes. I felt confident knowing I smelled good. My friend complimented me too.  I canu2019t forget about the design of the bottle! It looks elegant on my dresser. The chain mail dress design is so unique. I would recommend this as a Christmas gift for sure. Perfect for the Winter season as this perfume suits well with the cold seasons.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: New perfume from Pace Rabanne is called fame, first about packaging, I liked the unique bottle concept, fragrance is sweet with mix of vanilla musk and mangoe tone, I like that fragrance is not too strong , so items not over powering , but I would like more if it stays for longer , first as soon as you spray it smells more like fruity tone and then after a while you can get that musky tone. I like it that you can wear it for both day and night time due to itu2019s musky and mangoe tone, Itu2019s my new addition to the vanity but I think itu2019s little pricy , we could get similar kind of fragrance in little lower price , but over all Iu2019m happy with it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: In my opinion, its scent is that of musk, vanilla, woodsy & a touch of floral  I am not a huge fan of parfumes as I'm sensitive to scents but Fame is not harsh at all. I recommend it. ud83dudc4c

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume has the perfect scent for the girls and the theys like me that are not very fond of the overly floral and feminine smells.  I find that the Fame by Paco Rabanne has a more universal scent that is more influenced by woods than it is by flowers... or at least that's what my nose picks up on it.  It is also extremely good for long term wear lasting for an entire day and night out with friends, and that was just 2 sprays, one on each wrist, I can definitely understand the price point as will easily last months as long as you aren't over doing it at each use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

Thanks influenster, Sephora and Paco Rabanne

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

My only complaint would be that itu2019s very standard smelling? pleasant but very average in the aspect of a scent profile, making it a safe blind buy. This is more of a night time leaning perfume in my opinion, as itu2019s a little strong for day to day. I would repurchase this after I finish my bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin

When I sprayed it, the smell was intense, it's a lot stronger than I expected but that helps with the staying power and I could still smell it a few hours later. I think this would be a good choice for someone who has a varied taste in perfume as it's got fruity, floral and a hint of woody notes and I think it would make a perfect gift for someone. The bottle is very chic and fashionable and looks great on top of my dresser! I highly recommend this perfume and would encourage you to get a sample whiff next time you're at a store as you will not be disappointed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve definitely enjoyed this perfume! I get warm/spicy and amber notes, which I really like. It has more of a mature vibe than other perfumes I own. Itu2019s also a pretty cute display piece. I received this from Influenster in exchange of my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was a big hit for me. First time trying this brands perfume. Very sophisticated, sexy and classic at the same time. Long lasting and not overwhelming. Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a sweet evening scent that is warm and tropical with a hint of mango. There is a strong patchouli scent in the base and it is both sweet and spicy. This perfume lasts all day but the scent changes and becomes richer and more musky as the day goes on, perfect for when the day becomes evening. The bottle is also super cute to add to a perfume display. Highly recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off, the bottle is absolutely adorable and chic. The moment I saw it I knew that it was an homage to Pacco Rabanne's plastic chainmail mini dresses from the 1960s, a very memorable collection. The bottle looks great on my vanity and you'd never know it's perfume! The scent is very tropical and floral with a touch of intrigue and drama. It's very lightweight and warm which makes it perfect for everyday wear. But it doesn't last that long. However, if you're looking for full on drama, intrigue and sensuality I recommend Lady Million Royal. Both perfumes have become go to in my daily life, one for the daytime/work/ and the other for events or when I want to feel mysterious.  I loved the Fame scent and this makes the perfect everyday perfume plus again the bottle is just so so cute! The scent may not be long-lasting but the memory of it sure will be. Although I received this in exchange for an honest review, all thoughts and opinions are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. First the bottle of this perfume is so nice! I love that it looks like a person with sunglasses so cute! Perfect to display on your vanity. When I first sprayed the perfume it smelled sweet then after a few hours it smelled more of a floral scent with a mix of musk. I am not a huge fan of floral scents but this one I can handle. It lasted all day and is the perfect scent for a night out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Paco Rabanne Fame Parfum strikes the perfect balance between boldness and subtlety. The scent is so powerful, yet it never overwhelms me, with key notes of mango, jasmine and incense. It possesses a timeless quality, making it suitable for both daytime and evening wear. The longevity of Fame Parfum is amazing, with the fragrance lingering on my skin throughout the day. The bottle design is a work of art in itself, reflecting the glamorous essence of the fragrance. The sleek, gold-toned bottle is a statement piece that adds a touch of luxury to any vanity. Itu2019s a must-have for those who appreciate the finer things in life.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

With its soft hints of sweet fruity mango, a warm mixture of spices with a hint of musk which makes this fragrance one that can take you through all of the seasons! I highly recommend this beautiful perfume  to anyone who love their floral u2764ufe0f  #gotitfree #perfume #trybeforeyoubuy #PacorabanneFameParfume

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

A big spritz def comes out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Listen, Iu2019ve tried at least 5 new perfumes in the past yearu2026 This one is my favourite! Itu2019s a perfect mix of sweetness, musk, and intensity without being too over powering. Iu2019ve never gotten so many complemented. also it actually lasts all day!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The perfume has a nice, sweet scent. However itu2019s a bit too strong for my liking. Itu2019s floral & super sweet The bottle is adorable, such a cute bottle to have on display!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary in exchange for an honest review. I have to say, I am pretty impressed with this scent. Given it's longevity, it's new and improved packaging (I absolutely love the little robot, I think it's adorable) when compared to other Paco Rabanne perfumes (the pointy diamond shape was a tad awkward) I do have to give this perfume a solid five stars. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So this perfume is my new favourite. I feel like Iu2019m on vacation when I wear this because of the key notes of mango and jasmine.   I also like the fact that the Parfum is responsibly formulated with ethically sourced ingredients. This approach is very important right now when we are all about sustainability.   The bottle design is amazing!!! The chain mail dress just screams sophistication. The glossy black exterior mirroring the dress creates this beautiful visual and I love to just show it off with my other perfume collection.   I love the scent and I think it says sophistication and style. I have worn it on special occasion and to work so I feel like it can be a go to scent for feeling fabulous haha.

reviews.review_title: Sultry and Intoxicating, perfect for a night out!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not only is this the coolest perfume bottle Iu2019ve ever seen, but i am also thoroughly impressed with the scent! Iu2019m usually quite hesitant trying new fragrances as I  am normally drawn to more subtle - vanilla or fruity scents. It definitely has some sweet/fruity notes upon spraying (not an overwhelming sweetness), but then it fades to a delightful sultry scent that lasts for quite a long time. If youu2019re also a fan of sweeter fragrances, Iu2019m sure you will love this. In my opinion, I would say this is the perfect perfume to wear for a night out. Itu2019s very intoxicating- in a good way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and Paco Rabanne in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. To begin, I want to comment on how cute the bottle is! I know a lot of people think paco rabanne packaging is tacky, and I agree for some, but I find the fame bottle adorable. I will say that generally my experience with paco rabanne atomizers has not been the greatest (anything less than a full spray will come out as a stream of liquid). Onto the perfume, fame opens with a very strong mango top note. Itu2019s not a fresh mango, but reminds me more of mango candy. Personally, I find the opening a bit cloying but luckily it fades quite quickly on the skin after a few minutes. The mango does stick around for a while on clothes though. Once the top notes fade, the perfume settles into a sweet, creamy floral and pretty much stays that way except I find it gets more powdery with wear. Nothing special about the dry down, I find it a very generic inoffensive floral. Sillage is moderate, and longevity is also nothing remarkable although the scent lasts much longer on clothes. I could see this being someoneu2019s everyday perfume, although it might lean a bit heavy in warmer weather. Personally, itu2019s not exactly my cup of tea but I can see why people would enjoy this.

reviews.review_title: creamy mango jasmine with warm woody musk

reviews.review_text: starts off pretty sweet then the musk and sandalwood shows.   I usually lean towards stronger scents but this is a nice mix of fruity, floral and woody. I didnu2019t find it too sweet so it was a really nice mix of sweet, floral, musk and sandalwood.    lasted about 4 hours wear while I was out and I  received many compliments on my perfume which was great!   I would definitely gift this to someone itu2019s nice and creamy with jasmine and mango but also woody and warm with musk and sandalwood. itu2019s a great scent to have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this perfume free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. The bottle is cute and would make a great gift for someone who collects cool perfume bottles. I like the button to spray, It doesnu2019t spray too much perfume out at a time. On first spray it smelled kinda spicy, warm, musky on me. I was hoping for the mango or sweet notes to come out on my skin but, they never did. After it dried down it was a lot nicer, soft and more powdery but still a hint of musk. My mom tried and more sweet notes came out on her. Neither of us were fans of this perfume, it was just too musky and powdery where I prefer more floral/fruit scents. This does seem like a more u201cmatureu201d scent. This fragrance is long lasting but does dry down more light. Iu2019m sure on others this would smell lovely, but unfortunately warm, musk, powder scents smell horrible with my skin chemistry. I was happy to try this though, thank you Influenster & Paco Rabanne for the opportunity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Kindly gifted by Influenster for my review. u2728  Paco Rabanne Fame has become my latest obsession! The bottle is just so cute. Its unique (I am big on packaging) Perfect for a gift ud83dudc9d   The scent? Pure magic. It starts with this refreshing burst, like a warm hug on a sunny day. As it settles, there's this lovely floral vibe that's both girly and fierce.   What's unique is that I'm not a fan of florals u2013 most of my perfumes are vanilla and woody. But this one stands out and is perfect for those of us who usually steer clear of florals. It's not overbearing and the perfect middle.   THE LONGEVITY!!!!!  Very few scents manage to stick around on me, and it's always a struggle. However, Fame is one of the rare few that has lasted all day without needing a reapplication.  I feel it will stick around in my collection for 7 years like their Olympia. Paco Rabanne Fame has officially overtaken the competition and is my everyday for the season!

reviews.review_title: Say hello to paco rabanne fame parfum ufffc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: *I received this perfume from Influenster in exchange for my review.  I am extremely pick when it comes to fragrance and was worried this was going to be a miss - I was (mostly) wrong. I love sweet scents and when you first spray this, it gives a very sweet, vanilla-leaning woodier floral smell. However, after it blends into my body chemistry after some time, I find I pick up significantly more on the floral notes and the perfume becomes a scent profile I would typically shy away from. I would not recommend this for someone who wants to emphasize the woodier, muskier scent profiles. This is very much so for the ones who appreciate the more conventional floral scents with a little twist. Overall, though, I would continue to wear this. I find it a great choice for both an occasion as it feels classic, elegant, and elevated with the florals as well as a more casual evening because it can be cut with the sweeter notes - It feels feminine and fun for a girlsu2019 night on the town.   I find the bottle is a little gimmicky, but itu2019s a very cute and unique piece to have out on your vanity or in your bathroom because itu2019s so elaborate in design. It would be a cute gift for someone who appreciates unique bottle designs. The bottle sprays well despite this design and Iu2019m happy it isnu2019t a nuisance or impractical. It has a sturdy design and I am not afraid it will topple over accidentally.

reviews.review_title: The perfect balance of floral & spice ud83cudf3aud83cudf36ufe0f

As it settles, the musky and sandalwood notes wrap you in a classy, lingering embrace. It's the kind of fragrance that turns heads and leaves an impression-elegance in every spritz! I was definitely unsure about this as I thought it might be too overwhelming but it's the perfect balance! The scent lasts SO LONG too - you just need 1-2 spritz and youu2019re good for the day! Definitely a scent that makes me feel so confident and energetic! ud83eudd70Not only does FAME Parfum captivate the senses, but its bottle is a work of art. Encased in a sleek, modern design, the packaging exudes elegance with its clean lines and golden accents. The attention to detail extends to the tactile experience of the bottle, making each spritz a moment of indulgence! Received product from Influenster in exchange for my honest review, my review is 100% honest.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this product by Influenster. I have always loved the original Fame EDP by Paco Rabanne, but personally this one attracts me more. The scent is deeper, muskier, and sexier than the original brighter, fruity Fame. Mango are in the DNA of each scent, but due to the blend of musk and jasmine added to the Parfum, I find myself sniffing this one ever so more than the EDP. It finds itself in a great balance between sweetness and edge. The bottle is very fun and spraying it is easy. I enjoy the black sequin element. This is a very versatile and inoffensive fragrance, so you can wear is any occasion you see fit. Personally, due to the deeper element of the Parfum, it will be a nighttime scent for me! Just because itu2019s fruity doesnu2019t limit it to being just a summer fragrance. While the EDP is a 3.5-4 star in my books, this one comes to a 5/5.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very summery, mature fragrance. I own a lot of perfumes and am familiar with all different notes and genres of fragrance, I will say this is not my taste but objectively I can appreciate this scent and can see how a lot of people would like it.   True to the original FAME EDP, mango is the prominent note in this fragrance. The other note that sticks out to me is the jasmine, it adds a sharpness to the scent, which I think is what I donu2019t like for me personally, since Iu2019m pretty picky with my florals. This is in the same category as Mugler Alien Goddess, it has the same u00ab sunscreen u00bb type vibe, I almost detect some coconut in here even though itu2019s not listed as a note.  These types of scents are perfect for summer, especially hot climates by the beach! It is unfortunately winter here in Canada but I think perhaps Iu2019ll enjoy it more in the summer months. The best part about this fragrance is its longevity, I only sprayed twice and 12 hours later I can very much still smell it. A lot of these tropical scents are light and fade easily, this one is perfect if you like the original FAME but want something louder, that projects and lasts longer!  Full honesty, I genuinely think most people would like FAME Parfum though, as long as youu2019re into florals. Itu2019s a safe, mass-appealing scent, not the most unique but an easy grab nonetheless.   Received product from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. This does not affect my honesty, I try being as objective as possible in my reviews.
